about__text: Enigma Residence is a unique residential complex where comfort and quality, combined with cutting-edge technology, become a reality.
information__text:
The residential complex is located on the tropical island of Phuket
just 600 meters from the Rawai waterfront.
location__text: Location on an elevated area makes the Enigma complex one of the highest in the area, offering breathtaking views of Rawai and Chalong bays on one side and the green hills and surroundings of Nai Harn beach on the other.
location__text2: In addition to the excellent location, we offer a variety of amenities for your comfort.

faq__content.title: Online Purchase
faq__content.text: It is possible to complete the transaction without being physically present in the country. Viewing the property and consultation are available with a manager via video or audio call, as well as through messengers.

faq__content.title: Payment Methods
faq__content.text:
Payment methods:
- Non-cash payment
- Cash payment in baht
- Interest-free installments during construction.

faq__content.title: Forms of Ownership
faq__content.text:
The Enigma Residence complex offers the following forms of ownership:
1. Foreign Freehold – full ownership by a foreign individual or legal entity.
2. Leasehold – long-term lease with renewal every 30 years.
3. Thai Freehold – full ownership for Thai individuals or legal entities.
